definition: to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
to sew/to stitch together/to combine/to link/to connect/to put words together/to compose/to embellish

sentences.english: They wear crudely stitched-together clothing, and use simple weapons and tools like clubs and staves.
sentences.chinese: 他們穿着粗劣拼綴的衣物，使用棍棒之類簡陋的武器。

sentences.english: The Ewok costumes were five-piece affairs with sculpted heads.
sentences.chinese: 伊沃克人道具服由5片拼綴而成，外加雕刻的頭套。

sentences.english: Hand-made textile goods in patchwork application techniques.
sentences.chinese: 採用拼綴技術製作手工織品。
